error.message: Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.

Interface Drupal\field_validation\FieldValidationRuleInterface extends deprecated interface Drupal\Component\Plugin\ConfigurablePluginInterface: Drupal\Component\Plugin\ConfigurablePluginInterface is deprecated in Drupal 8.7.0 and will be removed before Drupal 9.0.0. You should implement ConfigurableInterface and/or DependentPluginInterface directly as needed. If you implement ConfigurableInterface you may choose to implement ConfigurablePluginInterface in Drupal 8 as well for maximum compatibility, however this must be removed prior to Drupal 9.
Call to deprecated method urlInfo() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface::toUrl() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated method urlInfo() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface::toUrl() instead.

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to field_validation.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
